title: Issues with patcher
body:
https://pastebin.com/2jAxSFhV

I can't get my client to reinstall and consistently get error 004 after trying to download the game itself in the client. Only other thing of note is that A bunch of league files are corrupted but it's somewhat random as to which.

Would appreciate some help, included my logs.

Thanks

replies.body: It sounds like your patcher is having some problems while scanning the game files for updates. You should be able to get it scanning again by updating your [**permission settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions), but let me know if that doesn't help!
